titleStmt.title: The counterfeit lady unveiled. Being a full account of the birth, life, most remarkable actions, and untimely death of Mary Carleton, known by the name of the German Princess.
titleStmt.author: Kirkman, Francis, 1632-ca. 1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Peter Parker, at the Leg and Star, over against the Royal Exchange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Francis Kirkman by Wing.
Item at reel 152:2 identified as Wing K7 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and Bodleian Library.
